Mr. Speaker, I rise today in strong opposition to H.J. Res. 35, which  will block the methane polluter fee, which is designed to control  wasteful methane from the oil and gas industry.

This resolution is another attempt by Republicans to put corporate  polluters ahead of hardworking…
